metadata.name: HackTool - Covenant PowerShell Launcher
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious command lines used in Covenant luanchers

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-sta')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-nop')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-window')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hidden')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-command')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-encodedcommand'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sv o (new-object io.memorysteam);sv d ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta file.hta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('grunthttp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-encodedcommand cwb2acaabwaga'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious command lines used in Covenant luanchers
